Package org.apache.nutch.indexer.staticfield

A simple plugin called at indexing that adds fields with static data.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
StaticFieldIndexer A simple plugin called at indexing that adds fields with static data.
 

Package org.apache.nutch.indexer.staticfield Description

A simple plugin called at indexing that adds fields with static data. You can specify a list of fieldname:fieldcontent per nutch job. It can be useful when collections can't be created by urlpatterns, like in subcollection, but on a job-basis.
